doc.name: version
doc.summary: Returns the application engine's version number.

examples.example: put the version into field "Version" of me

if item 1 of the version < 3 then
answer "Not all features will be available"
end if

description.p: Use the version function to determine whether the application supports a particular feature.
The version function returns a string describing the version of LiveCode running.

The version number belongs to either the LiveCode application (if the stack is being used with LiveCode) or to the running standalone application. The engine version of a standalone is the same as the engine version of LiveCode that was used to create it.
